sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Cancels a goods receipt document in SAP ECC - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP ECC - RFC.
  • Select BAPI - Option to select either standard or custom BAPI.
  • Material Document Number - Material document number that needs to be cancelled. Sample Input : 5000002353.
  • Material Document Year - Year in which material document was created. Sample Input : 2023.
  • Posting Date - Date on which material document is cancelled. Sample Input : 20230130.
  • User Name for Printing Goods Receipt/Issue Slip - User name for printing goods receipt or issue slip.
  • Material Document Items - Objects containing these fields:
    • Item in Material Document
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP ECC - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Cancel Goods Receipt - Goods receipt document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP ECC - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP ECC - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding SAP ECC - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_ECC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_documentation.sys_name: User Name for Printing Goods Receipt/Issue Slip

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Cancels a goods receipt document in SAP ECC - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP ECC - RFC.
  • Select BAPI - Option to select either standard or custom BAPI.
  • Material Document Number - Material document number that needs to be cancelled. Sample Input : 5000002353.
  • Material Document Year - Year in which material document was created. Sample Input : 2023.
  • Posting Date - Date on which material document is cancelled. Sample Input : 20230130.
  • User Name for Printing Goods Receipt/Issue Slip - User name for printing goods receipt or issue slip.
  • Material Document Items - Objects containing these fields:
    • Item in Material Document
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP ECC - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Cancel Goods Receipt - Goods receipt document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP ECC - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP ECC - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding SAP ECC - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_ECC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
